items.sentence: Tom's lecture was so boring that half the audience left before he had finished.
The seven deadly sins are: pride, envy, greed, anger, lust, gluttony and sloth.
Have you ever given a speech to an audience of more than three thousand people?
Have you ever considered how much richer you'd be if you didn't drink or smoke?
When you're finished using my tools, please put them back where you found them.
